name: Gude!Jump
description:
Intro

If you like challenging Plattformers like I do but you are as frustrated as me by soft-button controlls, you will enjoy Gude!Jump.

The game is about a glowing cat Jumping and climbing through the Levels. Why? It likes Jumping I guess. It is a cat afterall.

  • Find all Butterflies and try to find all Hidden (Golden) butterflies, too.
  • Beat your own best time.

Check out the Gameplay Video 

Gude!Jump supports keyboad and touch controls.

Touch Controls:

  • Only two thumbs needed, touching anywhere left or right:
  • touch left -> go left
  • touch right -> go right
  • touch right then left -> jump Right

Keyboard Controls:

  • 'A' or 'LeftArrow' -> go left
  • 'D' or 'RightArrow' -> go right
  • 'W' or 'UpArrow' or 'Space' -> jump

Note: The Game is 95% Finished (last 4 levels missing ) and will be finalized in June.
